name: ACM--ICMSS 2018 2nd International Conference on Management Engineering, Software Engineering and Service Sciences_Ei
content: The 2nd International Conference on Management Engineering, Software Engineering and Service Sciences will be held during Jan 13-15, 2018 in Wuhan, China. The conference is sposored by # Wuhan University, China#. \*\* Paper Publication: All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published into #acm conference proceedings#, indexed by \*\*Ei Compendex\*\*. \*\* Contact us: Ms. Caroline Miu, Conference Secretary E-mail: icmss\_icmss@163.com. Tel: +861-3258-11111-7
